name: Wizard.Step
description: A wizard presents a series of steps in  prescribed order. That the user needs to complete in order to accomplish a goal (e.g. purchase a product)
note: Use Wizard with nested Wizard.Step(s) to achieve the desired result.

props.name: color
props.description: Color of the step index (or of the icon, when provided)

props.name: indexLabelStyle
props.description: Additional styles for the index's label (when icon is not provided)

props.name: enabled
props.description: Whether the step should be enabled

props.name: accessibilityInfo
props.description: Extra text to be read in accessibility mode
